title: HQ Photo Enlarger 1.68 – Innovative image enlargement
content: The program offers an innovative image enlargement algorithm which results in perfectly smooth and crisp edges. And it can simulate the texture and film grain which keep photos looking natural even in extreme enlargements.HQ Photo Enlarger beats any of the alternative solutions, such as Photoshop’s Bicubic technique, Bilinear methods, and so-called ‘industry standards’. title: CopyLess 1.7.7 – Store and access up to 100 clipboard items
content: CopyLess is an advanced and flexible clipboard manager. Unlike the system clipboard CopyLess can store up to 100 items to which you have instant access at any time. With CopyLess is no longer necessary to switch constantly between different applications or windows just to copy and paste several different items. Everything can now be copied […]

title: Lamoji 1.2 – Insert emojis into your text
content: Lamoji is an application that lets you easily insert emojis into your text. Use them to make your messages more colorful and more fun! title: Porthole 1.3.0 – AirPlay all audio to multiple speakers
content: Porthole is a tool that lets you stream the music from your favorite music player such as Spotify or Pandora to your Airplay speakers, Apple AirPort Express and Apple TV. Porthole focuses on being elegant and simple to use. title: Sparkbox 1.2 – Smart web image capture application
content: Sparkbox helps you manage images for design projects. Unlike iPhoto, it catalogues all of your images, not just the photographs you’ve taken yourself. title: Algodoo 2.1.0 – 2D physics sandbox where you can play with physics like never before
